title.newValue: Microsoft Teams: Background Blur and Effects for Citrix

description.newValue:
Microsoft Teams users on virtual desktop infrastructure (VDI) for Citrix will be able to blur their background in a video meeting or call, or replace it entirely with the images provided.
More info: https://m365-mcrp.azurewebsites.net/request/active/9691
GA date: September CY2022
